comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: The Domain carpark was officially opened on 9 June 1961, so I think this photograph is more likely circa 1960 than circa 1950.

comment.author: 67193564@N03
comment._content: We'll pass that on to the Pictures and Manuscripts team for a closer look. Thanks.

comment.author: 67193564@N03
comment._content: The record for the Domain carpark has been updated to a date of ca. 1956. catalogue.nla.gov.au/Record/4690512 Our cataloguers did a great job on quick research and found: Newspaper article in 1955 on Trove (nice piece of cross promotion) about the tender being awarded and construction would begin in 1956 nla.gov.au/nla.news-article107759465 References in a book on Thiess company history saying construction started 1956 books.google.com.au/books?id=Sz3yAAAAMAAJ&q=thiess+ca... The photograph appears to be at the excavation stage, and so very early in the construction process. So 1956 is most likely, certainly the earliest date, if later then the ca. indicates our uncertainty.

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: That was quick! Agreed. 1956 seems a suitable date.
